Package errorSimulator

Class ErrorSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • errorSimulator.ErrorSimulator

  • public class ErrorSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the error simulator for the server-client-error simulator system. Has capability to receive/send messages from/to both client and server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ErrorSimulator​()
      Constructor
      ErrorSimulator​(int port)
      Constructor with defined port number to receive on.
